name: Admirari Demo
description:
Horror visual novel inspired by Wonderland. Hopefully you make the right choices and are able to get out of the land of Admirari. This is a demo since  I do plan on making it longer but I would like people to see  what its like to get a vibe of the story.

Experience is also a lot more fun with headphones :)!

Art done by Sketchyemi 

Writing  done by me Sueneki 

Background music from PlayOnLoop.com
